resources.string: INFORMATION \nIt gives information of Movies and singers
ALBUMS LIST \nHere the user can see his albums and details. It would use the public class CardView to display each album as cards with album cover image, singer name and album title.
PLAYLIST \nHere the user can see, edit and choose to play a custom playlist.
SETTINGS SCREEN \nHere the user can adjust the configuration of the app.
Starting point of the activity. Which will be the starting activity for all other activity.
The PayPal APIs are HTTP-based RESTful APIs that use OAuth 2.0 for authorization. API request and response bodies are formatted in JSON.
